note:
We are a free online digital archive of documents created by industries impacting public health, hosted by the University of California, San Francisco Library. We began in 2002 to house millions of documents publicly disclosed in tobacco industry lawsuits & have expanded to include material from the opioid, drug, chemical, food, and fossil fuel industries. Our mission is to preserve open access & support research into commercial determinants of health.
https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu
